snippet: The Jackson Women’s Health Organization, the state’s last remaining abortion clinic, would have closed on Monday under the new law.
abstract: Federal Judge Daniel P Jordan III temporarily blocks a Mississippi law from taking effect that would have forced the closure of the state's last remaining abortion clinic.
lead_paragraph: The Jackson Women’s Health Organization, the state’s last remaining abortion clinic, would have closed on Monday under the new law.

headline.seo: Judge Blocks Anti-Abortion Law in Mississippi
headline.main: Mississippi Law Aimed at Abortion Clinic Is Blocked
headline.print_headline: Mississippi Law Aimed at Abortion Clinic Is Blocked
